alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Talbot, southern Queen Anne`s and Caroline Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Talbot, or 11 miles southeast of South River, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Talbot, Denton, Romancoke, Federalsburg, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, St. Michaels, Preston, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Grasonville, Starr, Copperville, Jumptown, Agner, Tanyard, Harmony and Tilghman Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
